title: Provide Proof of Delivery (POD)
description: A customer's finance department requires a signed Proof of Delivery (POD) for a shipment before they can pay the invoice.

tasks.description: Find the shipment record associated with the customer's order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the specific shipment in the logistics system.

tasks.description: Retrieve the signed POD document from the carrier's system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent downloads the scanned POD, which includes the recipient's signature.

tasks.description: Email the POD to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the signed POD to the customer's finance contact.
